Title: Serial (Bad) Weddings 2
Writer: Guy Laurent (adaptation), Guy Laurent (dialogue), Guy Laurent (screenplay), Philippe de Chauveron (adaptation), Philippe de Chauveron (dialogue), Philippe de Chauveron (screenplay)
Actors: Christian Clavier, Chantal Lauby, Ary Abittan, Medi Sadoun
Plot: Claude and Marie Verneuil face a new crisis. The four spouses of their daughters, David, Rachid, Chao and Charles decided to leave France for various reasons. Here they are imagining their lives elsewhere.
